thread.title: Irish man (44) dies while on holiday in Spain
thread.title_full: Irish man (44) dies while on holiday in Spain

title: Irish man (44) dies while on holiday in Spain
text:
The 44-year-old was on holidays in Barcelona with friends. 
It is understood he became separated from his friends on Saturday night before falling ill. 
The Department of Foreign Affairs has said it is aware of the case and is providing consular assistance. 
More to follow.
